columns.text:
Welcome to Ayoba Santorini

Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth.

Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! It is slang for “cool, alright, ok”. In Zulu, it means “will be”. Ayoba is a feel-good word. It takes us to our a happy place. A place that’s more than alright actually, better then cool: the ravishing slice of Santorini. Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. The secluded location of Ayoba will evoke your senses as you peacefully surrender to the ageless spell of Santorini.

items.title: Cloud 9
items.description:
Welcome to Cloud 9

Heavenly moments of amazing vacations are waiting for you and your loved ones at Cloud 9 which is nestled in the heart of the colorful volcanic rocks of the famous Caldera, just 400 m above the sea level.Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction. These two luxurious villas feature a minimalistic modern decor, mixing high class facilities and breathtaking sea views.

Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool. At Ariadne villa you may also choose among two heated swimming pools, one indoor and one outdoor plus a steam room that provides you with memorable moments of warmth.If you wish to step out of the ordinary in a magic world of lavishness, Cloud 9 suites are the place to awaken your senses, granting you with a wide range of amenities for an even sweeter accommodation!

At a glance 

  • Two amazing villas nestled on the highest point of Caldera
  • Located in Imerovigli village’ Santorini island’ Greece
  • Operating season: March to November
items.excerpt: Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction.

amenities.item: Two amazing villas nestled on the highest point of Caldera
Private sea view terrace with double day bed, chairs and table (Both Villas)

items.title: Art Hotel Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Art Hotel Santorini

Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art.

Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day.

As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way!

The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.

SEO.title: Ayoba Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Ayoba Santorini, in the picturesque village of Imerovigli, Santorini offers complete privacy & exquisite grace.
